item.title: 赞比亚经济增长飙升至 2021 年以来最高水平
item.description: 赞比亚财政部长表示，随着非洲第二大铜生产国从降雨量改善和金属产量提高中获益，赞比亚今年的经济将至少增长6%。【原文：Zambia’s economy will expand at least 6% this year as Africa’s second-largest copper producer reaps the benefit of improved rainfall and higher metal production, the finance minister said.】

item.title: 中国主要钢铁机构警告电动汽车价格战正在惩罚钢厂
item.description: 中国主要钢铁工业集团警告说，电动汽车价格战正在伤害钢厂，并加深其财务困境。【原文：China’s main steel industry group has warned an electric vehicle price war is hurting mills and deepening their financial woes.】

item.title: 关税担忧缓解，英国富时 100 指数突破 3 月份纪录
item.description: 由于经济前景改善和贸易紧张局势缓和，英国富时 100 指数收盘价将创下 3 月份以来的新高，挽回了因关税引发的跌势。【原文：The UK’s FTSE 100 index was set to close at a record high for the first time since March, recouping its tariff-induced slump thanks to an improving economic outlook and easing trade tensions.】

item.title: 维勒鲁瓦称欧洲央行仍可迅速调整利率
item.description: 欧洲中央银行理事会成员弗朗索瓦-维勒鲁瓦-德-加尔豪（Francois Villeroy de Galhau）表示，即使在连续第八次降息使货币政策 "正常化 "之后，欧洲中央银行仍可能迅速调整利率。【原文：The European Central Bank could still move quickly to adjust interest rates even after an eighth successive cut “normalized” monetary policy, according to Governing Council member Francois Villeroy de Galhau.】

item.title: 诺和诺德在《金融时报》报道激进分子 Parvus 持股后大涨
item.description: 诺和诺德公司（Novo Nordisk A/S）的股价升至两个多月来的最高水平，此前有报道称激进对冲基金 Parvus Asset Management 已经增持了该公司的股份，因为这家丹麦制药商正在努力保持其在肥胖症市场的领先地位。【原文：Novo Nordisk A/S shares rose to the highest level in more than two months after a report that activist hedge fund Parvus Asset Management has built a stake as the Danish drugmaker struggles to keep its lead in the obesity market.】

item.title: 捷克杂货商推出人工智能送货平台，与 Ocado 竞争
item.description: 捷克在线杂货商 Rohlik 集团正在推出其人工智能驱动的快速杂货配送平台，其雄心勃勃的目标是在全球范围内与 Ocado Group Plc 等公司一较高下。【原文：Czech online grocer Rohlik Group is spinning out its AI-driven platform for speedy grocery deliveries with worldwide ambitions, taking on the likes of Ocado Group Plc.】

item.title: 马克-扎克伯格亲自招聘创建新的 "超级智能 "人工智能团队
item.description: 马克-扎克伯格（Mark Zuckerberg）对 Meta Platforms 公司在人工智能方面的不足感到沮丧，他正在组建一个专家团队来实现人工通用智能，该团队由人工智能研究人员和工程师组成，他们最近几周在他位于太浩湖和帕洛阿尔托的家中与他会面。【原文：Mark Zuckerberg, frustrated with Meta Platforms Inc.’s shortfalls in AI, is assembling a team of experts to achieve artificial general intelligence, recruiting from a brain trust of AI researchers and engineers who’ve met with him in recent weeks at his homes in Lake Tahoe and Palo Alto.】

item.title: 挪威核心通胀率降幅超过预期，创四个月新低
item.description: 挪威5月份的基本通胀率降幅略高于预期，这为挪威银行在未来几个月内开始降息提供了依据。【原文：Norway’s underlying inflation rate declined slightly more than expected in May, cementing the case for Norges Bank to begin interest-rate cuts in coming months.】

item.title: 全球投资者转而购买印度股票是看涨信号
item.description: 全球投资者有望在三个季度中首次成为印度股票的购买者，这可能是资金持续流入的一个积极指标。【原文：Global investors are on course to be purchasers of Indian equities for the first quarter in three, flashing a possible positive indicator of continued inflow.】

item.title: 里夫斯预算案公布后，英国就业率骤降，职位减少 27.6 万个
item.description: 英国财政大臣雷切尔-里夫斯（Rachel Reeves）提高招聘成本后，劳动力市场恶化，英国就业人数创五年来最大降幅，工资增长放缓幅度超过预期。【原文：UK employment plunged by the most in five years and wage growth slowed more than forecast, as the labor market deteriorated after Chancellor of the Exchequer Rachel Reeves ramped up the cost of hiring.】

item.title: 中国股市引领风险资产在贸易谈判前突然下挫
item.description: 在与美国进行贸易谈判的第二天之前，中国股市抹去了早些时候的涨幅，因为投资者在等待世界最大经济体之间在一些棘手问题上取得进展。【原文：Chinese stocks erased earlier gains before the second day of trade talks with the US, as investors awaited progress on some thorny issues between the world’s largest economies.】

item.description: 高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc.【原文：Goldman Sachs Group Inc. partner Aaron Arth will retire from the bank after nearly three decades at the Wall Street powerhouse.】

item.title: 韩元反弹后韩国养老基金停止出售美元
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，韩国国家养老金管理局已经结束了为期五个月的出售美元以支撑韩元的策略。【原文：South Korea’s National Pension Service has ended a five-month strategy of selling dollars in a bid to support the won, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 欧洲 IPO 旱情令证券交易所争相上市
item.description: 由于选择在欧洲上市的大公司越来越少，该地区的证券交易所正加大力度争取最大的上市机会。【原文：As fewer large companies opt to go public in Europe, the region’s stock exchanges are fighting harder to win the biggest listings.】

item.title: 特朗普削减研究经费，学术出版商签署人工智能协议
item.description: 由于美国科研经费削减，学术出版商正急于与人工智能公司签订许可协议，开辟新的收入来源。【原文：Academic publishers are rushing to sign licensing deals with artificial intelligence companies, carving out a new revenue stream as US research funding cuts dim their outlook.】

item.title: 花旗交易后，私募股权投资支持的 VeloBank 将目光投向波兰市场
item.description: 由美国私募股权基金 Cerberus Capital Management LP 支持的快速增长的 VeloBank SA 在收购了花旗集团在波兰的零售业务后，正在寻求更多的波兰收购。【原文：Fast growing VeloBank SA, backed by US private equity fund Cerberus Capital Management LP, is on the prowl for more Polish takeovers after it bought Citigroup Inc.’s retail operations in the country.】

item.title: 中国天然气行业游说更多发电厂以刺激需求
item.description: 中国的天然气生产商正在游说中国政府增加使用这种燃料的发电厂数量，以帮助支撑摇摇欲坠的需求。【原文：China’s natural gas producers are lobbying Beijing to increase the number of power plants that run on the fuel, in a bid to help prop up faltering demand.】

item.title: 习近平呼吁韩国李明博协助维护自由贸易
item.description: 中国国家主席习近平与韩国新当选总统李在明举行首次电话会谈，呼吁双方合作维护多边主义和自由贸易。【原文：Chinese President Xi Jinping held his first phone conversation with South Korea’s newly elected President Lee Jae-myung and called for cooperation to safeguard multilateralism and free trade.】

item.title: 韩国执政党推出允许使用稳定币的计划
item.description: 韩国新任总统李在明正在迅速行动，兑现其允许本地公司发行稳定币的竞选承诺，进一步推动全球最活跃的数字资产市场之一的发展。【原文：South Korea’s new President, Lee Jae-myung, is moving quickly to deliver on his campaign pledge to allow local companies to issue stablecoins, giving a further boost to one of the world’s most active digital-asset markets.】

item.title: 丰田汽车公司股东在年度会议上对收购提出质疑
item.description: 在丰田集团公布了将这家叉车、纺织机和汽车零部件制造商私有化的计划之后，丰田工业公司举行了可能是其作为上市公司的最后一次年度会议。【原文：Toyota Industries Corp. held what could be its last annual meeting as a public company, after the Toyota group unveiled plans to privatize the maker of forklifts, textile looms and auto parts.】

item.title: 日本央行上田帮助日元走软，交易员对评论嗤之以鼻
item.description: 日本央行行长上田一夫（Kazuo Ueda）表示，日本央行距离通胀目标仍有一定距离，他的这番言论加速了日元走软。【原文：Bank of Japan Governor Kazuo Ueda said the central bank is still some distance from its inflation goal in comments that helped accelerate a weakening of the yen.】

item.title: 美国商会称台湾举动对外国防务公司构成障碍
item.description: 一个美国商业团体表示，台湾对与外国公司进行防务合作的规定所做的修改可能会阻碍他们与台湾的合作；而这一观点恰恰发生在中国军方展示一些重要进展之际。【原文：Changes that Taiwan made to rules for defense cooperation with foreign companies might discourage them from working with the archipelago, an American business group says — a view that comes just as China’s military shows off some key advances.】

item.title: 日本总统石破在大选前承诺到 2040 年加薪 50
item.description: 日本首相石破茂表示，平均工资增长 50%和实现 1 夸脱亿日元（约合 6.9 万亿美元）的经济将是今年夏天上议院选举的首要竞选承诺。【原文：A 50% increase in average pay and a ¥1 quadrillion ($6.9 trillion) economy will be the top campaign pledges for this summer’s upper house election according to Japanese Prime Minister Shigeru Ishiba, as the date nears for voters to give their latest verdict on Ishiba’s administration.】

item.title: 交易商寄希望于贸易谈判，铁矿石走低
item.description: 铁矿石连续第二天下跌，原因是交易商在关注中美贸易谈判的任何进展，以及中国政府可能采取的刺激措施，这可能会重燃对这种炼钢材料的购买兴趣。【原文：Iron ore declined for a second day, as traders watched for any progress from US-China trade talks and potential stimulus from Beijing that could reignite buying interest in the steelmaking material.】

item.title: 华为创始人在贸易谈判继续进行之际挥别美国芯片禁令
item.description: 华为技术有限公司创始人任正非在《人民日报》头版发表文章，驳斥美国出口限制对中国的影响，涉足困扰华盛顿-北京贸易谈判的关键议题之一。【原文：Huawei Technologies Co. founder Ren Zhengfei dismissed the impact of US export restrictions on China in a front-page People’s Daily article, wading into one of the key topics dogging Washington-Beijing trade negotiations.】

item.title: 俄罗斯对基辅和敖德萨发动大规模无人机袭击，造成 1 人死亡
item.description: 当地政府称，俄罗斯对乌克兰首都基辅和黑海城市敖德萨发动了大规模无人机袭击，留下了一片破坏痕迹，并造成至少一人死亡。【原文：Russia unleashed a sweeping drone attack on the Ukrainian capital of Kyiv and the Black Sea city of Odesa that left a trail of destruction and killed at least one person, local authorities said.】
